job description:
Senior Director of Data Science
If you are a Senior Director of Data Science with a PhD or an MBA, please read on!

We are a world famous company e-commerce company with excellent benefits and access to a massive amount of data that needs analyzing!

Our Data Science team is looking for a Senior Director of Data Science to lead our team in tackling problems related to fraud and cybersecurity.
What You Will Be Doing
Apply Data Science and Machine Learning Techniques to make new businesses cases and lead them to production.
Lead adoption of the analytic frameworks across the company
Collaborate and consult leaders across the company for BI and Data Science solutions
Lead an extremely high performing team.
Make the team's vision a reality using a roadmap
Use Machine Learning to develop solutions
What You Need for this Position
- PhD in Computer Science is Required
- MBA is also preferred
- 5+ years experience manging a data science team
- 10+ years of Data Science experinece
- Hadoop
- Hive
- hBase
- SPARK
- Machine Learning
- Tensorflow
- Deep Neural Networks

BIG PLUS:
- Fraud & Security Experience
What's In It for You
- Competitive Pay
- Travel Allowance
- Fitness Allowance
- Tuition Reimbursement
- Sick days
- Vacation/PTO
- Medical
- Dental
- Vision
- 401k - 6%
So, if you are a Senior Director of Data Science with a PhD in Computer Science or an MBA, please apply today!
